AAL.caption: Theme
AAL.doc: Select a theme to apply to the date picker.
AAL.name: theme

AAe.caption: Initial date
AAe.doc: This option offers the possibility to set a starting date. Please note that you must follow this specific format (mm-dd-yyyy) to allow the matching to recognize month, day and year.
AAe.name: default_date

AAf.caption: Disabled dates
AAf.doc: This option offers the possibility to set a string of disabled days. So, separate all days by comma and the picker will convert them into an array. Please note that you must follow this specific format (mm/dd/yyyy) to allow the matching to recognize month, day and year.
AAf.name: disabled_dates

AAg.caption: Date format
AAg.doc: The date format the picker will write on the selected input.
AAg.name: format

AAh.caption: Animation
AAh.doc: If set to true, the picker will run an initial state animation and all user changes are animated.
AAh.name: fx

AAi.caption: Disable animation on mobile
AAi.doc: Animations could be very slow on some older smartphones. To prevent this, set this option to false to disable animations on any mobile viewport.
AAi.name: fx_mobile

AAj.caption: Set initial date
AAj.doc: This option changes the input value automatically, by default. Set to false to prevent it.
AAj.name: init_set

AAk.caption: Language
AAk.doc: Display Language to use for Month name and Day-of-week.
AAk.name: lang

AAl.caption: Show large mode on click of day.
AAl.doc: This option enables to switch the size of the picker by clicking on the icon at the bottom or clicking on the day block.
AAl.name: large_mode

AAm.caption: Show large view by default
AAm.doc: If is checked, this option shows the large view by default.
AAm.name: large_default

AAn.caption: Lock
AAn.doc: This option sets the date limit based on the assigned variable. If you set to "from", you can't select a date earlier than the current date. Opposed to this behavior, if it's set to "to", you can not select a date after the current date.
AAn.name: lock

AAo.caption: Minimum year
AAo.doc: The lowest year that the control will allow.
AAo.name: min_year

AAp.caption: Maximum year
AAp.doc: The highest year that the control will allow.
AAp.name: max_year

AAs.caption: Modal
AAs.doc: If this option is set to true, the picker will be displayed centered, with a dark overlay in background.
AAs.name: modal

ABB.caption: Use lock to allow selecting dates only to/from initial date. False will not lock any dates
ABB.name: lock_info

ABM.caption: If "Set initial date is checked" the datepicker will display the initial set date instead of the placeholder text. If not checked the initial date is null and the placeholder text will be displayed.
ABM.name: initial_info

AAb.caption: value
AAb.doc: Returns the currently selected date by the picker
AAb.name: value
